tool_description: ByBit P2P API. Get SELL and BUY ads according to your criterias. Use for profitable P2P trading. #BTC #ETH #USDT #USDC
name: ByBit P2P API
title: ByBit P2P API

api_list.name: Search ByBit P2P Ads
api_list.description: This API will help you to get real-time buy and sell ads from ByBit P2P exchange for any supported crypto and fiat currency pair.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bybit-p2p-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bybit-p2p-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bybit-p2p-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bybit-p2p-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
